Package eu.tivian.hardware

Class MonostableTimer

java.lang.Object
eu.tivian.hardware.MonostableTimer
public class MonostableTimer
extends Object
Mono-stable operating of NE555 timer.
Since:
2019-11-06
Author:
Pawe≈Ç Kania
See Also:
NE555 datasheet

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    double capacitor
    Value of capacitor connected between pins 6 and ground of real NE555 timer.
    Pin output  
    double resistor
    Value of resistor connected between pins 4 and 7 of real NE555 timer.
    Pin trigger
    LOW at trigger pin will cause the timer to fire.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    MonostableTimer​(double resistor, double capacitor)
    Initialize the values of discrete elements

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void trigger()
    Level at output pin will change from HIGH to LOW after chosen amount of time.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • resistor

      public double resistor
      Value of resistor connected between pins 4 and 7 of real NE555 timer.

    • capacitor

      public double capacitor
      Value of capacitor connected between pins 6 and ground of real NE555 timer.

    • trigger

      public final Pin trigger
      LOW at trigger pin will cause the timer to fire.

    • output

      public final Pin output

  • Constructor Details

    • MonostableTimer

      public MonostableTimer​(double resistor, double capacitor)
      Initialize the values of discrete elements
      Parameters:
      resistor - value of resistor in ohms
      capacitor - value of capacitor in farads
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either resistor value or capacitor value is negative

  • Method Details

    • trigger

      public void trigger()
      Level at output pin will change from HIGH to LOW after chosen amount of time.
      The timeout is calculated with the formula: ln(3)*R*C
      See Also:
      Formula source
